languages.text: "Неумирающий не отпускает души верных от себя. А Домин'Теодора — слишком священная особа, чтобы не отыскать путь к Его Трону".
languages.translation_comment: Abelard: "These rumours... about Lord Captain Theodora... Surely you do not believe them?"

languages.text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий не отпускает души верных от себя. А Домин'Теодора — слишком священная особа, чтобы не отыскать путь к Его Трону".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
"The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
"The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
"The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
"The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

languages.text: "Der Todlose gibt die Seelen der Gläubigen nicht auf. Domin'Theodora ist eine zu heilige Person, um nicht den Weg zu seinem Thron zu finden."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose gibt die Seelen der Gläubigen nicht auf. Domin'Theodora ist eine zu heilige Person, um nicht den Weg zu seinem Thron zu finden."

languages.text: « L'Immortel n'abandonne pas les âmes de Ses fidèles. Domin'Théodora est une figure par trop sacrée pour ne pas siéger auprès de Son trône. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel n'abandonne pas les âmes de Ses fidèles. Domin'Théodora est une figure par trop sacrée pour ne pas siéger auprès de Son trône. »

languages.text: «El Inmortal no renuncia a las almas de sus fieles. Domin'Theodora era una persona demasiado sagrada para no acabar ante Su Trono».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal no renuncia a las almas de sus fieles. Domin'Theodora era una persona demasiado sagrada para no acabar ante Su Trono».

languages.text: 「不死の者は忠実な者の魂を手放すことはない。ドミン・シオドーラは神聖なお方だから、彼の王座に行く道を見つけられないのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者は忠実な者の魂を手放すことはない。ドミン・シオドーラは神聖なお方だから、彼の王座に行く道を見つけられないのだ」

languages.text: “不死之神绝不会放弃虔诚信徒的灵魂。像秘者西奥多拉这样圣洁的人，一定会找到通往黄金王座的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神绝不会放弃虔诚信徒的灵魂。像秘者西奥多拉这样圣洁的人，一定会找到通往黄金王座的道路。”

languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, inançlıların ruhlarından feragat etmez. Domin'Theodora, o kadar kutsaldır ki O'nun Tahtı'nın yolunu bulmaması mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls of the faithful. Domin'Theodora is too sacred a person not to find her way to His Throne."
